system.effect: Chunks of the target's flesh are ripped free by the force of the attack leaving large, weeping wounds. The target is Stunned for 1 round and suffers Blood Loss.

description.value:
Explosive Damage to Body (Severity 6)

Chunks of the target's flesh are ripped free by the force of the attack leaving large, weeping wounds. The target is Stunned for 1 round and suffers Blood Loss.
